projects.title: DevFest Salem 2025
projects.description: Single-handedly designed and developed the complete visual identity and design system for DevFest Salem 2025. This project showcases my ability to create cohesive brand experiences from concept to execution, including event posters, digital assets, tickets, and promotional materials.
